nodes.text: Blixii were rare, half-shelled semi-aquatic creatures with tentacles and six sharp legs. They shared a common ancestor with the rathtar, vixus, and sarlacc, all possesing a large maw, tentacles, and a voracious appetite. Each was native to different worlds, and the different species had adapted separately to become great hunters in their specific environments.
They could notably be found on Scarif, where they dragged insufficiently vigilant passers-by into lagoons to eat them.

During the Clone Wars, Separatist Commander and Zygerrian slaver Darts D'Nar owned a blixus which he kept aboard his ship, the Tecora. When D'Nar was forced to escape from Kiros aboard the Tecora, he unleashed his pet blixus upon Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and his apprentice Ahsoka Tano. At first it coiled one tentacle around Tano's foot, she cut it off, but Skywalker was coiled around his arms, making it difficult for him to use the lightsaber, even though he cut the tentacle, as Tano snuck into the cockpit, Skywalker was once again coiled around the arms, as it brought him to its mouth, Skywalker was able to kill it with his lightsaber.
